ygData.subject: RE: AW: [eqbards] Katanas
ygData.msgSnippet: I think it is trash.  5dmg?  That s pathetic.  The haste is irrelevant as you can only have one haste item and one haste spell at any given time. 5dmg is
ygData.messageBody:
I think it is trash. 5dmg? That's pathetic. The haste is irrelevant as
you can only have one haste item and one haste "spell" at any given time.
5dmg is dreadfully low and there is a limit as to how low, even with haste,
the dly on a weapon can be. Max haste isnt that hard to get, and 5/24 is
rotten, jade mace 9/18 less than 10k on my server and I am sure lots cheaper
on others. If you are just looking for the looks then maybe you will be
happy with it. But as a weapon for anyone high enough to actually group and
get it. You probably already have better.

Mu

-----Original Message-----
From: Umi-chan [mailto:mizu_no_miko@...]
Sent: Friday, July 20, 2001 9:05 AM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: AW: [eqbards] Katanas


I'm going to ask, just because you said not to... how much for it? And
how rare is it? Rare as is forget it, even if I get my cleric on a kael
raid there's no f***ing chance she'd even be able to roll for it, or
regular old trash weapon to be given to twinks?

"Egelhof, Tobias" wrote:

> velium swiftblade from kael ;) looks like a katana. stats are 1hs 5/24
>
> effect haste. dont ask for price =)
>
> tobi
>
>
